talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wish I could offer you a reward as well,
but the tools I need are in my shop on
the surface.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Sorry, but could I ask you to come by
once things in town have settled down?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I think your reward is going to turn out
fantastic though. It'll be worth the visit!
talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're looking to sell something? <sp:5:0:0>OK!
Have you got anything especially
beautiful to show me?
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway, did you need something?<sp:0:4:0>The owner may not be here, but I'll
do what I can.
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_01>I still can't believe you took on such a
huge monster and won.<sp:0:4:0>Hylian voe are pretty impressive!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've been waiting for you.<sp:5:0:0> You made some
room in your pouch, right?

This is a token of my appreciation!
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well? Did you make room in your pouch?
Doesn't look like you've gotten to it yet.<sp:0:4:0>I'd really like to give you a <clr:0000>diamond<clr:ffff> to
thank you, so could you come see me
once you've cleaned up your pouch?
Com_Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Any self-respecting vai would have her
pouch well organized.<sp:5:0:0> The owner used
to say that all the time.
talk0016: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I had no idea you were in such—<sp:5:1:0> Hm?
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh yeah, have you spoken to the owner?


She was so excited about the reward she
has in store for you!
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>If it isn't the voe who saved the owner!<sp:0:4:0>I want to repay you, so could you please
come over here for a second?
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If this shop's <clr:0000>owner <clr:ffff>were here, she
probably could have made you all sorts
of things.
But she went out to look for potential
adornments and hasn't come back since.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>She was in such high spirits, too, gushing
about all the treasures she'd find around
the <clr:0000>Toruma Dunes<clr:ffff>.
That's a dangerous place though.
<clr:0000>Molduga <clr:ffff>territory.<sp:5:0:0> I hope she didn't
run into trouble...
Com_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>If you waste too much time trying to make
up your mind, good opportunities—and
vai—will pass you by!
Com_Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Sell as much as you like.<sp:5:0:0> Boldness is an
attractive trait!
Shichihou: One day I'll be an artisan...
talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let me know if any of the <clr:0000>accessories<clr:ffff>
catch your eye!

I'm ready and eager to make adjustments
to them for you! The fit is so important,
after all.
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you sell me a lot of stuff, I feel like
it could spark life into my creations.
In that way, we both win!
talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Unfortunately, the sand shroud has made
it tough to get supplies.<sp:5:1:0> The stock is
of the highest quality, just a bit limited.
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Things from the outside world are just
so interesting!
talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Just speak up if you're interested in any
of the <clr:0000>accessories<clr:ffff>.

Unfortunately, my stock is a little limited
right now thanks to the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>. But
everything here is of the highest quality!
I'm ready and eager to make adjustments
to them for you too. The fit is important,
after all.
talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You know, I never would have thought I'd
talk to a voe for so long. It's kind of neat!

Since I'm always in the workshop making
<clr:0000>accessories<clr:ffff>, the <clr:0000>owner<clr:ffff> is usually the one
who gets to talk to customers.
talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Sarq!


I personally guarantee that this accessory
will fit you perfectly!
talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>That said, I really wish this voe would stop standing
on my precious wares...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0000:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmmm, so this is a voe. <sp:5:1:0>His ears look to be
about...<sp:5:1:0> And the circumference of his head and
neck...<sp:5:1:0> Interesting.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh! I'm sorry! You're the first voe I've
ever seen—<sp:5:0:0>I got a little carried away
figuring out your measurements!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Why was I doing that? <sp:5:0:0>Because I make
<clr:0000>accessories<clr:ffff>, and the key to any good
accessory is the perfect fit!
My name's Cara. I haven't had a lot of
opportunities to make accessories for
a voe...
So if you give me the chance, I'll put
everything I've got into making some
really great ones for you!
talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Different gems offer different kinds of
protection. When you wear one, it
bestows that protection on you.
For example, a <clr:0000>ruby<clr:ffff> has the power to
make a bitter chill bite less. <sp:5:0:0>Or you could
avoid the oppressive heat with a <clr:0000>sapphire<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Customers used to have to supply the
materials for an accessory. Made-to-
order, if a bit of extra work...
But that's not the case anymore thanks
to the gems we've been getting from
<clr:0000>Eldin <clr:ffff>up in <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff> Hyrule.
We just make the accessories in advance
and save the customer the legwork.

There is a slight difference in the price
though, but that's to be expected.
talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm so happy my <clr:0000>accessories<clr:ffff> appealed
to you!

I know the quality is reflected in the price,
so I offer you a truly heartfelt "sarq!" for
buying so many pieces!
talk0002:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmmm, so this is a voe. <sp:5:1:0>His ears look to be
about...<sp:5:1:0> And the circumference of his head and
neck...<sp:5:1:0> Interesting.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh! I'm sorry! You're the first voe I've
ever seen—<sp:5:0:0>I got a little carried away
figuring out your measurements!
Why was I doing that? <sp:5:0:0>Well, this is the
<clr:0000>jewelry<clr:ffff> shop, I make <clr:0000>accessories<clr:ffff>, and the
key to any good accessory is a perfect fit!
My name's Cara. I haven't had a lot of
opportunities to make accessories for
a voe...
So if you give me the chance, I'll put
everything I've got into making some
really great ones for you!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'd like to reward you as well!<sp:0:4:0>But my reward is a little involved, so do
you mind coming to talk to me when you
have some time?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If the shop <clr:0000>owner<clr:ffff> was here, she'd be able
to make more pieces, I bet.

She went out a while ago. I hope she
hasn't gotten lost somewhere...
talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I never get the chance to talk to voe, so
ask me questions whenever you want.
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I want to repay you for saving the owner.<sp:5:0:0>
Could you come over here?
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I want to repay you for saving the owner.<sp:5:0:0>
Could you make some room in your pouch
and come over here?
GreetingBefore03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq!<sp:5:0:0> You've clearly got excellent taste
to be picking that out!
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Now that the <clr:0000>owner<clr:ffff>'s back, we can all
breathe a sigh of relief.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>After all, she's not just a <clr:0000>highly esteemed
artisan<clr:ffff>, she also supplies the chief with
her weaponry.
talk0006:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Hmmm, so this is a voe. <sp:5:1:0>His ears look to be
about...<sp:5:1:0> And the circumference of his head and
neck...<sp:5:1:0> Interesting.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh! I'm sorry!


<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's not exactly normal to see a voe in
person around here, so I was taking the
chance to memorize as much as I could.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Phew!<sp:5:0:0> I'm glad that Isha, the <clr:0000>owner<clr:ffff> of the
shop, has finally come back.

The whole shop had this underlying
stress just...<sp:5:0:0>floating around it while
she was gone.
You have to understand—Isha is a well-
regarded artisan, and she's even been
armorer to Lady Riju!
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Well, look who it is!<sp:0:4:0>The owner tells me you rescued her from
a Molduga!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Sarqso, truly!<sp:5:0:0> Here's a little something
to reward your bravery.
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I want to thank you too.<sp:5:0:0> Allow me to say
sarqso again for saving my life.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Greeting>What?<sp:5:0:0> This <clr:0000>diamond<clr:ffff> won't fit in
your pouch...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I won't be able to relax until I've given
you a proper reward.<sp:5:0:0> Can you come back
once you've made some room?
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>owner <clr:ffff>of this jewelry shop is a vai
named <clr:0000>Isha<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I only make <clr:0000>accessories<clr:ffff>, but the owner's
a <clr:0000>well-regarded artisan<clr:ffff> and has even
served as armorer to Lady Riju.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If <clr:0000>Isha <clr:ffff>were here, she probably could
have made you all sorts of things.

Last I saw her, she was telling me all
about how she planned to scour the
<clr:0000>Toruma Dunes <clr:ffff>for adornments.
She left in high-enough spirits, but she
still hasn't come back.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>And the dunes are <clr:0000>Molduga<clr:ffff> territory, so
I can't even go look for her...
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>This is pretty great...<sp:5:0:0> I feel like this could
really inspire my creations.
talk0028:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> So voe like to ask the same sorts of
questions. That's good to know...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh, sorry. <sp:5:1:0>You were asking about
the owner?
Com_Talk_13: And how many do you want to sell?
GreetingAfter03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq! <sp:5:0:0>I'm excited to see what styles
interest a voe!
talk0029:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> So voe like to ask the same sorts of
questions.<sp:5:1:0> That's good to know...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh, sorry.<sp:5:1:0> You were asking about
accessories, yes?
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm... My intuition tells me that you
should hang on to it.<sp:5:0:0>
talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Come back soon! We're the only place in
the whole world that makes accessories!
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Wait, you're gonna undress here?
Do I need to call the guards?
talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Sarq!


I'm pretty proud of the quality on that.<sp:5:0:0>
Make sure you put it to good use.
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>Awww.<sp:5:0:0> You changed your mind?<sp:5:0:0> It might
be sold out by the time you come back...
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Looks like you can't carry anything else.
Could you maybe sell something or throw 
something away, and then come back?
talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, that's an idea! Since the sand shroud
is still going strong, I can't really venture
out. Have you got anything unusual?
